com.fourjva.dao.base

Class JpaDao<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fourjva.dao.base.JpaDao<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Entity class on which the DAO will work
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemDao, UserDao

    public abstract class JpaDao<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for managing persisted entities and creating DAOs
